description: Minor Variation of Premises Licence (licence number 872376) to amend the terminal hour for all licensable activities permitte by the premises licence to midnight everyday.  To amend the closing time of the premises to 00:30 everyday.  To amend existing condition 336 (requirment for a personal licence holder to be on the premises) to read "after 8pm on Thursday Friday and Saturday night a personal licence holder will be on the premises at all times the premises are in operation under the premises licence".  To amend existing Condition 291 (engagement of door supervisors) to read "on Thursdays, Fridays and Saturdays at least two SIA registered door supervisors will be employed at the premises from 9pm until all patrons have left the premises.  They will be responsible for screening patrons entering the premises, conflict management, to maintain a safe accommodation limit and and timely dispersal of patrons"
